page.title: 10Living in the area.
page.content: As in most areas of Britain, there are vast differences in the types of housing, standards of living and general way of life within this square. A small survey of eating habits in part of the square showed that the traditional Roast was the most popular Sunday lunch.Many young people enjoy McDonald's or something similar and almost anything with chips! A survey conducted in a local road found the most popular domestic pet was the cat, with dogs second. The most unusual were snakes and tree frogs. A popular area for holidays is Spain where where people go for sunshine and sand.For many people a holiday is the largest single expenditure in the year.It is also one of the most important activitiesof the year.
